patthana21.27:4.1: Nahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.27:4.2: Nanahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.27:4.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.27:5.1: Nahetuṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.27:6.1: Nahetuṃ naappamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
